tag_list: photo, ecommerce, start-ups, digital-imaging, on-line-marketing, social-media
overview:
15 years of e-commerce experience and a lifetime of imaging industry experience.

I am currently Executive Vice President of MailPix.com, bringing my skills and years of experience in ecommerce and imaging together to build a world class imaging business for Mailpix, Inc. I joined Ritz Camera and Image as Vice President of RitzPix.com and Online Retail in October 2010. Prior to this I was at Ritz Interactive Inc. as Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer and a founding member of Ritz Interactive Inc. Responsibilities included IT, Customer Service and Distribution and Fulfillment.
